name: Fanta Stick
description:
The intense rhythm of percussions hitting your hearts
The beautiful melody of Korean classical music
And the change of Korean classical music combined with pop to rock.
The live gukak musical amazes the whole world

Feel the joyful fun-virus through watching competition between experts of act and performance.
The largest modern upgraded performance of gukak- Korean classical music.

The first and the best live gukak musical show that you can imagine,
Fanta-Stick will present you the best performance ever.
Percussions, string music, whole movements and sounds of Korea are gathered in one stage.
